text: Sir Edward MacMillan Taylor (18 April 1937 â€“ 20 September 2017) was a Scottish Conservative Party politician. He was a member of parliament (MP) from 1964 to 1979 for Glasgow Cathcart and from 1980 to 2005 for Rochford and Southend East. He was a leading member and vice-president of the Conservative Monday Club. Taylor died on 20 September 2017 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Glasgow Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
title: Teddy Taylor
